headline: Carey Reilly's hot Cyber Monday deals
subHeadline: Lifestyle expert Carey Reilly joins Charles Payne on 'CAVUTO Live' to recommend these deals for Cyber Monday

utterances.speaker: Lifestyle expert Carey Reilly joins Charles Payne on 'CAVUTO Live' to recommend these deals for Cyber Monday
utterances.utterance: 1. The Grip All in 1 Universal Charger

utterances.speaker: Timing
utterances.utterance: From now until December 2 2. Fire HD10 Kid's Edition

utterances.speaker: Deal
utterances.utterance: Save $50. Price will be $149.99 (was $199.99) 3. My Audio Pet Bluetooth speaker FOR KIDS

utterances.speaker: Deal
utterances.utterance: BOGO 50 percent off and get a free funsie with each order 4. Echo Show

utterances.speaker: Deal
utterances.utterance: $49.99 (was $89.99) 5. The August Smart Lock Pro + Connect

utterances.speaker: Deal
utterances.utterance: August Smart Lock Pro + Connect for $149 (save $130 from $279)

utterances.speaker: Where
utterances.utterance: August.com and national major retailers (including Amazon, Best Buy, Lowes and Home Depot) 6. FitBit Charge 3

utterances.speaker: Deal
utterances.utterance: Through Cyber Monday, you can get $50 off the original price, coming in at $99.95 for Charge 3 and $119.95 for the special edition which has all these great features, plus Fitbit Pay.
